title.native: 即死チートが最強すぎて、異世界のやつらがまるで相手にならないんですが。
title.romaji: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga.
title.english: My Instant Death Ability is Overpowered

description:
Yogiri Takatou missed out on a few things while napping during a school trip... mainly how his entire class got transported to another world and how a curious sage gave everyone special powers! When Yogiri wakes up, he and classmate Tomochika Dannoura must defend themselves against a dragon. Out of options, Yogiri reluctantly agrees to team up with Tomochika and fend off danger with his Instant Death ability. If he can keep his eyes open, that is...

(Source: HIDIVE)
synonyms: My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me!

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Anti-Hero
tags.description: Features a protagonist who lacks conventional heroic attributes and may be considered a borderline villain.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Ghost
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a ghost.

tags.name: Travel
tags.description: Centers around character(s) moving between places a significant distance apart.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Vampire
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a vampire.

tags.name: Trains
tags.description: Prominently features trains.
